TopicTitle: JellyCubes Advanced Weapons R&D - Weapons and Other Miscellanea

Articles.Content: I\'m more amused at the Newtonian physics ripping the railgun off of your ship.

Added a railgun version that works with 0.14. Ships now experience recoil when firing. The recoil force may force rip the railgun off your ship.

Ideally, I would like to create a railgun that spawns railgun shells so you don\'t have to manually add them in the VAB and make ammunition a consumable like fuel. A user controlled, turreted railgun version would probably also be possible or maybe a railgun that automatically detects other ships and fires on them.

By the God Emperor, make it so!

Of course, part of the hilarity will be when your railgun aims at another vessel through your own wing. Then blows your wing off. Ehehehe.

'Dad, are we hit?'

'More or less. Son, I\'m sorry. They got us.'

By the God Emperor, make it so!

Ahahaha. It\'ll be interesting to see the API documentation when it\'s released. If they open up animation in the form of rotating parts, this should be fairly easy. If not -- well, guided missiles are ALWAYS an option.

The AI that goes into guidance, lead calculation, motion prediction, and stuff like that is really what interests me most. I like the idea of dropping \'missile mines\' that lie dormant until they\'ve been unloaded (you move a certain distance away). Then, when you next get close enough for them to be unpacked, they target all vessels in the area (including you), and fire off their load of missiles. Then you get to dodge missiles. :3

There\'s all sorts of nifty things like that you can build. I really want to get my grubby paws on the API. Question, though -- does anyone know if there\'s a dev environment for C# that compiles DLLs other than Virtual Studio?
